entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Blowing snow over exposed areas this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Thursday 02 March 2023
